name: Vampire Slayer: The Resurrection
description:
Based on my Half-Life mod from years ago, Vampire Slayer: The Resurrection is a new asymmetric first-person hero shooter where the slayers have traditional weapons and the vampires rely on speed, strength and stealth.



Only the Slayers Carry Weapons. The Vampires have stealth, speed and deadly melee attacks.
Slayers must knock a vampire to the ground before staking them. If they do not stake them within a few seconds the Vampire will resurrect.



A Vampire can feed from dead Slayers to regain strength. Leap from tall buildings onto your prey or hunt in the dark.



Now YOU must choose a side.
